      • putString

        public static void putString(int r,
                             int c,
                             com.googlecode.lanterna.screen.TerminalScreen t,
                             java.lang.String s)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        Adapted from Mr. K's model, this places a string starting at (r,c) in the terminal.
        Parameters:
        r - The row position that this string begins at.
        c - The column position that this string begins at.
        t - The screen to place this string onto.
        s - The string to place.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • statusMessageUpdate

        public static void statusMessageUpdate(Player p,
                                       com.googlecode.lanterna.screen.TerminalScreen s,
                                       java.lang.String top)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Used for listing of a message above the maze, and player stats below the maze.
        Parameters:
        p - The player that this method gets stats from.
        s - The screen to display these stats on.
        top - The top message to be displayed.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
